title: Certaine orations and answeres made by Iohn Casimire Countie Palatine of Rhyne ... vnto the French king & his embassadours in defence of ye maintenance of his peace, and Christian religion. Translated out of French. 1579.
author: Casimir, Johann, Pfalzgraf bei Rhein, 1543-1592.
notes: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
